_header: My dear friends I you pray
Subjects: introductions, to prose texts; prayers; advice
_description: Introductory couplet to Quinta Tabula in Speculum Christiani with heading ‘Hec tria coinquinant hominem’

BLHar1197.Transcription: My dere frendis I you prayiiij thingis bere in youre hertis awey

HunHM124.Transcription:
My dere freendis y ȝou prayThre thyngis bere in your hertis
                    away

BodDou107.Transcription:
my dere frendis I ȝou prayffoure þingis in ȝour hertes
                    bere a way
